location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘2. Sketch of Country Round Shaiba to Illustrate Actions of 12th to 14th April’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:205 x 238 mm, on sheet 300 x 308 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Vandyked at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. S.D.O. No. 3931.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by form lines.Sketch map showing Shaiba Fort and surrounding area produced to illustrate the movements of British and Turkish military forces between the 12th and 14th April 1917.Oriented with west to the top.
